summary: TO: WHOM IT MAY CONCERNS:    I AM WRITING TO YOU AS A DISSATISFIED DODGE CARAVAN OWNER.  I PURCHASED MY VAN BRAND NEW ON MARCH 1999. I HAVE HAD CONSISTENT PROBLEMS WITH THE CAR, SINCE THE DAY I PURCHASED IT:  A)     ON JANUARY 24, 2000 WE REPLACED THE , SENSOR, TRANSAX LE, TURBIN INPUT IN THE TRANSMISSION.  B)      FEBRUARY 17, 2000 WE REPLACED THE BATTERY.   C)      FEBRUARY 20, 2001.  WE REPLACED THE EVAPORETOR, SUCTION LINE, LIQUID LINE AND THE COIL IN THE AIR CONDITION UNIT.  D)      REPLACED THE WINDOW LIFT MOTOR.  E)       JANUARY 8,2002 REPLACED SOP BELT TENSIONER COIL .  F)       JANUARY 4,2002 REPLACE THE BATTERY.  G)      MARCH 2, 2002    REPLACED WINDSHIELD WASHER PUMP.  H)      JUNE 2, 2002         REPLACED FUEL SEAL.  I)        NOVEMBER 13, 2002 REPLACED THE HIGH PRESSURE VALVE OF THE A/C  NOW THEY ARE ASKING US TO REPLACE THE EVAPORETOR AND THE COMPRESSOR  WHICH WAS REPLACED BY MAROONE DODGE ON FEBRUARY 2001!!!  ALL REPAIRS WERE DONE AT AUTHORIZE DODGE DEALER:  MAROONE DODGE LOCATED: 21151 N.W 2ND AVE  MIAMI, FL 33169 TEL: 305-653-6343.    WE FEEL THAT FOR 44,000 MILES CAR WE SHOULD NOT EXPERIENCED SO MUCH PROBLEM ESPECIALLY WITH THE A/C WHICH WAS FIXED IN 2001.  WE HOPE YOU WILL CORRECT THE WRONG AND REPAIRED THE CAR WITH NO COST TO US.SINCERELY DAVID AND HONEY BOUGANIM  239 ATLANTIC ISLE  SUNNY ISLES, FL 33160  TEL: 305-945-5354
